mapper.select: select * from ECM_TCECIR_CS left join ECM_TCECIR_SR on ECM_TCECIR_CS.CIR_ID = ECM_TCECIR_SR.CIR_ID left join ECM_TCECIR_SS on ECM_TCECIR_CS.CIR_ID = ECM_TCECIR_SS.CIR_ID left join ECM_TCECIR_CR on ECM_TCECIR_CS.CIR_ID = ECM_TCECIR_CR.CIR_ID where ECM_TCECIR_CS.TRACE_ID = #{traceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ECM_TCECIR_CS.CIR_CLIENT_STTM

select * from ECM_TCECIR_CS left join ECM_TCECIR_SR on ECM_TCECIR_CS.CIR_ID = ECM_TCECIR_SR.CIR_ID left join ECM_TCECIR_SS on ECM_TCECIR_CS.CIR_ID = ECM_TCECIR_SS.CIR_ID left join ECM_TCECIR_CR on ECM_TCECIR_CS.CIR_ID = ECM_TCECIR_CR.CIR_ID where ECM_TCECIR_CS.CIR_ID = #{cirId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
